resources.string: SABI is a sign language translator mobile application that can make it easier for users to understand and communicate in sign language.
SABI provides the main features in the form of a sign language dictionary feature and a sign language translator feature that is easy to use with an attractive appearance.
You can see sign language from different letters and words. You can also use the available search feature to find the word you want in sign language.
Detect sign language movements by pointing the camera and get the translation results.
See sign language from different letters and words. You can also use the available search feature to find the word you want in sign language.
